data.name: Tales of Tarium: Awakening from the Ashes
data.detailed_description:
Ikki is a young knight who lost his only family by the plague, sees his mentor being publicly executed for conspiring against the king. With no other option he joins the sacred order of Domula in hopes to get his revenge for his master.

Earn your reputation helping the innocent people of Tarium dealing with savage cultists, the tyranny of a mad king and the everlasting threat of a racial war with the elves, orcs or dwarves.

Explore this dark medieval world while fighting mythological creatures. Throughout betrayal, nervous battles and hidden truths. Defend the honor of high members of the church, help the rebellious group and embrace on a quest to reveal the secrets of this land.

Tales of Tarium Awakening from the Ashes is a tactical RPG based on turn-based combat, with a wide variety of classes combining different skills to produce unusual interactions inside battle.



This game contains events that some people may be uncomfortable with. They aren’t graphically detailed and possess some hand painted style. Users may encounter textual descriptions about violence, kidnapping, and religious themes. Player discretion is advised.

data.short_description: Explore this dark medieval world while fighting mythological creatures. Throughout betrayal, nervous battles and hidden truths decide whether to defend the honor of high members of the church, help a rebellious group of cultists or embrace on a quest to reveal the secrets of this land.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent with 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may change during development.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent with 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may change during development.

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains events that some people may be uncomfortable with. They aren’t graphically detailed and are represented by a hand painted style. Users may encounter textual descriptions about violence, usage of legal drugs such as tobacco and some religious themes.
